oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Pioneer Rhythm Boys - WHFB - 1948-11-20
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pioneer Rhythm Boys radio show for station WHFB, Benton Harbor, MI. Originally broadcast Saturday November 20, 1948 at 11:30 am. Featuring John Chase (announcer), Eddie Skates (host), and (verbally identified) band members Bud 'The Deacon' Wheeler, Ray 'The Professor' Watkins, Butch, Tiny, and Marcy Smith. Sponsored by Ray's Auto Service and Al's Grocery.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Pioneer Rhythm Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme -- Opening statement (John Chase) -- Opening statement (Eddie Skates) -- Dying A Sinner's Death -- Ray's Auto Service commercial (John Chase) -- Eddie Skates introduces Butch -- Swing Blues No. 1 -- Eddie Skates and Marcy Smith talk -- Eddie Skates introduces Tiny -- Mississippi Sawyer -- Al's Grocery Store commercial (John Chase) -- Eddie Skates introduces Marcy -- I'm Waltzing with a Broken Heart -- Eddie Skates introduces the Professor -- Beneath Hawaiian Palms -- Closing statement (Eddie Skates) -- Theme -- Closing statement (John Chase)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WHFB (Radio station : Benton Harbor, Mich.); Pioneer Rhythm Boys
